parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions "Echipa Forța Dreptei", which clearly refers to the political party "Forța Dreptei" and its team.  This directly relates to a parliamentary candidate (Article 36 (7) - a).</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The post's message is not a private communication but aims for broader dissemination (Article 36 (7) - c).</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post's message ("Echipa Forța Dreptei aduce împreună profesioniști dedicați pentru un viitor mai bun") aims to present Forța Dreptei in a positive light, implicitly encouraging voters to support them.  The objective is clearly to influence the electoral outcome (Article 36 (7) - c).</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It's not presenting objective facts or diverse perspectives but rather promotes a specific political party. It does not adhere to journalistic standards of impartiality and verification.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The statement is not a personal opinion; it's a promotional message from a media outlet on behalf of a political party. The context is clearly political advertising, not personal expression.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1117848819974618</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Tele 3 Media, promotes the "Forța Dreptei" party.  While the message itself is relatively generic, its placement as a paid advertisement during or after the electoral campaign period (end_date: 1732953600, which corresponds to November 23, 2024, after 18:00) and its clear intention to positively portray the party constitute electoral propaganda. The post targets a wide audience in Gorj County, Romania, as evidenced by the ad's targeting data.  The spend is significant (RON1.5K - RON2K), indicating a deliberate effort to influence voters.  The lack of journalistic objectivity further strengthens the classification as propaganda.  The absence of a CMF number is not a decisive factor, as the post's content and context clearly indicate its propagandistic nature.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Forța Dreptei</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Tele 3 Media</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Tele 3 Media, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID: 1117848819974618) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează Partidul Forța Dreptei cu mesajul "Echipa Forța Dreptei aduce împreună profesioniști dedicați pentru un viitor mai bun", având un efect electoral pozitiv asupra partidului menționat. Postarea, cu o cheltuială de RON1.5K - RON2K, a vizat o audiență largă în județul Gorj, România, conform datelor de targetare.  Lipsa obiectivității jurnalistice și intenția clară de a influența votul, fac din această postare material de propagandă electorală, contrar prevederilor legale.  Contact: office@tele3.ro, +40774658934, https://tele3.ro/.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
